com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.offline

Class CacheAreaDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.offline.CacheAreaDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class CacheAreaDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    A cache area defined by a style URL, an array of LatLngBoundsZoom, and device pixel ratio.

    pixelRatio must be ≥ 0 and should typically be 1.0 or 2.0.

    if includeIdeographs is false, offline region will not include CJK glyphs
